scripts.build:mac:windows: npm run build && npm run prepare:mac:windows
scripts.prepare:mac:windows: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -R .next/standalone/ dist/ && cp -R .next/static dist/.next/static && cp -R public/ dist/public && cp package.json dist/package.json && cp next.config.mjs dist/next.config.mjs && cp .env.template dist/.env.template  && rm -rf dist/.next/cache && rm -rf dist/node_modules && rm -rf dist/.env
scripts.prepare:windows:
if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist && mkdir dist && xcopy .next\standalone dist\.next\standalone /E /I && xcopy .next\static dist\.next\static /E /I && xcopy public dist\public /E /I && xcopy package.json dist\package.json /I && xcopy next.config.mjs dist
ext.config.mjs /I && xcopy .env.template dist\.env.template /I && xcopy ../installation/tasks dist	asks /E /I && if exist dist\.next\cache rmdir /s /q dist\.next\cache && if exist dist
ode_modules rmdir /s /q dist
ode_modules && if exist dist\.env del dist\.env
